unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Secret Sauce for Cracking Those Exams?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Secret Sauce for Cracking Those Exams?**

unnormalised: Hey folks, exam season is looming, and students across India are sweating it out! But worry not, there’s a tech revolution happening right under your nose! We’re talking exam prep apps!
normalised: Hey folks, exam season is looming, and students across India are sweating it out! But worry not, there is a tech revolution happening right under your nose! We are talking exam prep apps!

unnormalised: Forget those dusty textbooks and late-night chai sessions (well, maybe keep the chai!). Apps like Testbook, Gradeup (now BYJU'S Exam Prep), and Adda247 are becoming the go-to for students prepping for everything from JEE to UPSC. Think instant mock tests, video lectures by amazing teachers, and even personalized doubt clearing sessions.
normalised: Forget those dusty textbooks and late-night chai sessions (well, maybe keep the chai!). Apps like Testbook, Gradeup (now B Y J U apostrophe S Exam Prep), and Adda two hundred and forty seven are becoming the go-to for students prepping for everything from J E E to U P S C. Think instant mock tests, video lectures by amazing teachers, and even personalized doubt clearing sessions.

unnormalised: Heard from Rohan from IIT Delhi, who swears by these apps for his GATE prep. "Seriously, it's like having a personal tutor in your pocket, especially when you're burning the midnight oil!"
normalised: Heard from Rohan from I I T Delhi, who swears by these apps for his G A T E prep. "Seriously, it is like having a personal tutor in your pocket, especially when you are burning the midnight oil!"

unnormalised: And with Onam around the corner, imagine practicing with these apps while munching on some delicious Payasam - talk about a perfect study break! Experts say these apps, with their gamified learning and adaptive testing, are changing the game. Is this the future of education, folks? Looks like it!
normalised: And with Onam around the corner, imagine practicing with these apps while munching on some delicious Payasam - talk about a perfect study break! Experts say these apps, with their gamified learning and adaptive testing, are changing the game. Is this the future of education, folks? Looks like it!
